building missiles
{
    levels practice_field archery_range catapult_range siege_engineer 
    {
        practice_field requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, slave, } 
        {
            capability
            {

building market
{
    levels trader market forum great_forum curia 
    {
        trader requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, slave, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { egypt, } and resource grain
                taxable_income_bonus 250 requires factions { romans_brutii, } and resource incense
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource timber 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource amber 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource wild_animals
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource hides 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource pigs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource dogs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource furs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource pigs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { carthage, } and resource elephants
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { britons, eastern, } and resource silk
		taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { eastern, } and resource camels
                law_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { greek, barbarian, eastern, egypt, carthage, }
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                market
            }
        }
        market requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { egypt, } and resource grain
                taxable_income_bonus 220 requires factions { romans_brutii, } and resource incense
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource timber 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource amber 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource wild_animals
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource hides 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource pigs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource dogs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource furs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource pigs  
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { carthage, } and resource elephants
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { britons, eastern, } and resource silk
		taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { eastern, } and resource camels
                law_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { greek, barbarian, eastern, egypt, carthage, }
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                forum
            }
        }
        forum requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } and building_present_min_level barracks city_barracks
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent assassin  1  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent assassin  2  requires factions { scythia, } 
                agent spy  1  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent assassin  1  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent spy  1  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent assassin  2  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent spy  1  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent assassin  1  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent spy  1  requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
                agent assassin  2  requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { egypt, } and resource grain
                taxable_income_bonus 220 requires factions { romans_brutii, } and resource incense
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource timber 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource amber 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource wild_animals
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource hides 
		taxable_income_bonus 80 requires factions { barbarian, } and resource pigs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource dogs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource furs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource pigs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { carthage, } and resource elephants

		taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { eastern, } and resource camels
                law_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { greek, barbarian, eastern, egypt, carthage, }
		
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades

                great_forum
            }
        }

            capability

                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, egypt, }
                taxable_income_bonus 200 requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, egypt, } 
                taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { egypt, } and resource grain

		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource dogs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource furs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource pigs
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { britons, } and resource silk
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  12000 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                gr_TRADE_HUB3
            }
        }
        gr_TRADE_HUB3 requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, egypt, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4 requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, egypt, }
                taxable_income_bonus 220 requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, egypt, } 
                taxable_income_bonus 50 requires factions { egypt, } and resource grain

		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource dogs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource furs 
		taxable_income_bonus 100 requires factions { romans_julii, } and resource pigs 
		taxable_income_bonus 120 requires factions { britons, } and resource silk
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  15000 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building population_control
{
    levels control suburbs villages towns cities settlement_1 settlement_2 settlement_3         
    {
        control requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost 500 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                suburbs
                settlement_1
            }
        }
        suburbs requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, egyptian, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, }
        {
            capability

                population_growth_bonus bonus -4
            }

             cost 2000

            upgrades

            }

        {
             capability

                law_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus -1
                farming_level bonus -2
             }
             construction  2 
             cost 3000
             settlement_min city
             upgrades

             }

        {
            capability

                law_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus -1

            }
            construction  3 
            cost 5000

            upgrades
            {

        }

building temple_of_farming
{
    levels temple_of_farming_shrine temple_of_farming_temple temple_of_farming_large_temple temple_of_farming_awesome_temple temple_of_farming_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_farming_shrine requires factions { dacia, carthaginian, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                farming_level bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_farming_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_farming_temple requires factions { dacia, carthaginian, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_farming_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_farming_large_temple requires factions { dacia, carthaginian, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                farming_level bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_farming_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_farming_awesome_temple requires factions { carthaginian, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                farming_level bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_farming_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_farming_pantheon requires factions { greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 6
                law_bonus bonus 5
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_fertility
{
    levels temple_of_fertility_shrine temple_of_fertility_temple temple_of_fertility_large_temple temple_of_fertility_awesome_temple temple_of_fertility_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_fertility_shrine requires factions { germans, egyptian, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_fertility_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_fertility_temple requires factions { germans, egyptian, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_fertility_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_fertility_large_temple requires factions { germans, egyptian, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades

                temple_of_fertility_awesome_temple
            }
        }

        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 3

            construction  5 
            cost  3200

            capability

                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                law_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades

        {
            capability

                temple_of_forge_temple

            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800

            }

            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400

building temple_of_fun
{
    levels temple_of_fun_shrine temple_of_fun_temple temple_of_fun_large_temple temple_of_fun_awesome_temple temple_of_fun_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_fun_shrine requires factions { armenia, egyptian, thrace, seleucid, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, pontus, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_fun_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_fun_temple requires factions { armenia, egyptian, thrace, seleucid, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, pontus, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_fun_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_fun_large_temple requires factions { armenia, egyptian, thrace, seleucid, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, pontus, } 
        {
            capability

                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2

            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city

            }
        }
        temple_of_fun_awesome_temple requires factions { armenia, egyptian, thrace, seleucid, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, pontus, } 
        {
            capability
            {

                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }

building temple_of_governors
{
    levels temple_of_governors_shrine temple_of_governors_temple temple_of_governors_large_temple temple_of_governors_awesome_temple temple_of_governors_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_governors_shrine requires factions { pontus, macedon, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_governors_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_governors_temple requires factions { pontus, macedon, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_governors_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_governors_large_temple requires factions { pontus, macedon, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
                farming_level bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus 25 requires factions { romans_brutii, }
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_governors_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_governors_awesome_temple requires factions { pontus, macedon, greek, romans_brutii, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
                farming_level bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus 30 requires factions { romans_brutii, }
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_governors_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_governors_pantheon requires factions { macedon, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                law_bonus bonus 6
                farming_level bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_healing
{
    levels temple_of_healing_shrine temple_of_healing_temple temple_of_healing_large_temple temple_of_healing_awesome_temple temple_of_healing_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_healing_shrine requires factions { egyptian, seleucid, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_healing_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_healing_temple requires factions { egyptian, seleucid, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_healing_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_healing_large_temple requires factions { egyptian, seleucid, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                population_health_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_healing_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_healing_awesome_temple requires factions { egyptian, seleucid, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                population_health_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_healing_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_healing_pantheon requires factions { egyptian, seleucid, greek, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                population_health_bonus bonus  4
                law_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus -7
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus  2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

            capability

                law_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades

            }
        }
    }

building temple_of_hunting
{
    levels temple_of_hunting_shrine temple_of_hunting_temple temple_of_hunting_large_temple temple_of_hunting_awesome_temple temple_of_hunting_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_hunting_shrine requires factions { spain, gauls, macedon, greek, pontus, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1  requires factions { gauls, }
                law_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_hunting_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_hunting_temple requires factions { spain, gauls, macedon, greek, pontus, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1  requires factions { gauls, }
                weapon_missile bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_hunting_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_hunting_large_temple requires factions { spain, gauls, macedon, greek, pontus, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1  requires factions { gauls, }
                weapon_missile bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_hunting_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_hunting_awesome_temple requires factions { macedon, greek, pontus, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5
                weapon_missile bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3

            construction  5 
            cost  3200

        }
        temple_of_hunting_pantheon requires factions { macedon, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 5

                law_bonus bonus 6
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }

building temple_of_leadership
{
    levels temple_of_leadership_shrine temple_of_leadership_temple temple_of_leadership_large_temple temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple temple_of_leadership_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_leadership_shrine requires factions { armenia, greek_cities, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, spain, gauls, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_temple requires factions { armenia, greek_cities, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, spain, gauls, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_large_temple requires factions { armenia, greek_cities, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, spain, gauls, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "barb druids gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, spain, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_awesome_temple requires factions { armenia, greek_cities, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "barb druids gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, spain, } 
                recruit "roman arcani"  0  requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 4
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_leadership_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_leadership_pantheon requires factions { greek_cities, romans_scipii, roman_rebels, greek, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "barb druids gaul"  0  requires factions { gauls, spain, } 
                recruit "roman arcani"  0  requires factions { romans_scipii, roman_rebels, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                law_bonus bonus 5
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 3
                population_growth_bonus bonus -3
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building temple_of_love
{
    levels temple_of_love_shrine temple_of_love_temple temple_of_love_large_temple temple_of_love_awesome_temple temple_of_love_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_love_shrine requires factions { scythia, pontus, greek_cities, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2  requires factions { scythia, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_temple requires factions { scythia, pontus, greek_cities, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2  requires factions { scythia, } 
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_love_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_love_large_temple requires factions { scythia, pontus, greek_cities, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2  requires factions { scythia, }

                population_growth_bonus bonus 3
                law_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  3

    levels roman_republic Socii_war Sulla_civil_war Sertorrius_rebellion Caesar_civil_war BATTLE_OF_PHILIPPI ANTONIUS_REBELLION
